alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, southeastern Holt and Wheeler Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Bartlett, or 21 miles northeast of Burwell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Knievels Corner, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Buffalo Flats, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Gables. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 140 and 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
